notes: This map illustrates satellite detected waters over the central part of Kassala state in Sudan extracted from Landsat-8 imagery (30m) acquired 05 June 2016 (Pre-event) and 08 August 2016 (Post-event). Since late June, it has been observed that the water expansion are predominantly located in areas along the Gash river banks. Additionally, the analysis carried out by UNITAR-UNOSAT also shows that most of the water expansion is around agricultural and vegetated areas.This analysis has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT
